npk.title: NPK Sensor Analysis
npk.subtitle: Connect to your ESP32 device to read real-time NPK data and get personalized organic fertilizer recommendations
npk.step1: Mix all organic materials thoroughly in a large container
npk.step2: Add {{amount}}L of water and stir well
npk.step3: Allow the mixture to ferment for 7-10 days, stirring daily
npk.step4: Strain the liquid and dilute 1:10 before applying to crops
npk.noData: No sensor data available. Click 'Read NPK Data' to connect to your ESP32 device.
